website_summaries.verdict: The Fujitsu ScanSnap iX500 is a capable and reliable document scanner that is fast in scanning to searchable PDF and did well in both text recognition and business-card scanning.
pros: Very fast at scanning to searchable PDF
Met its rated simplex and duplex scan speeds
Did well at reading business cards
cons: You can't give a scan command from within an application
Scanning to some programs may require several steps
Only connects wirelessly to one computer at a time

customer_reviews.title: Fast High Quality Multi Photo Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This scans photos quickly tona high quality, I’m surprised it does not promote this more. I was looking for a simple scanner that could quickly scan a pack of old photos into a computer folder. It does this seemlessly and extremely quickly. Absolutely brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over a year now and it is fantastic. I've been able to reduce the amount of paper in my office a huge amount. It makes the job incredibly easy and is super fast. My only gripe would be that twice over the last 18 months when updates have occurred on my reasonably old computer my ScanSnap hasn't connected properly. However, I've not reduced the 5 stars to 4 simply because the Scansnap customer service has been so incredible. This has changed my working practices and made my home office workable.
customer_reviews.author: Inaura69

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly tech savvy, but this has consumed my time more than any other device i've ever bought. It has filled my mac with more apps than I ever thought would be necessary. Complicated to use, only seems to connect to one device at a time and stops others connecting unless disconnected from the first. Even Wifi is a nightmare to set up. My advice - buy something else cheaper, I wish I had. Its a very expensive piece of furniture in our office and everyone still scans with a 5 year old Brother printer/scanner. But maybe I got a bad one...??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new addiction
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I've only just received this (despite wanting one for ages). It was easy to set up (on Mac) and the software is pretty intuitive. I scanned over 6 years worth of payslips in less than 5 minutes. I spent longer renaming the files (I then realised I would be quicker renaming them when the scanned image first opened up!). The unit is nice and compact, it's very quiet and has coped well with everything I've scanned so far (receipts, letters, payslips, some photos, etc). Once I get more familiar with what the unit and software can do I'm pretty sure I'll be boring everyone around me with my scanning successes.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant scanner
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as I have loads of documents to scan. I am technically competent but have no patience for things that require lengthy set up. This scanner was basically plug and play - really straightforward. The scanning is great. Does double or single sided. It has software to figure out whether a document is single or double sided and also to figure out which way up the pages are. It comes with some great software which means you can edit the pdf documents that have been created to make them perfect eg get rid of unwanted pages, merge pdfs, turn pages around etc. It is also quick to scan. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Lily anne

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, disappointing software
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. Scanning is very very quick and reliable. It scans single and double sided and performs automatic OCR on the pdf. It's well made, looks good and very compact. Deducted one Star because the software isn't that great. It works fine, but looks & feels like something from the last century. Every action that feels like it should take on click actually takes 4 and overall it's not very intuitive. It's not a major drawback because once it's been set-up, the scanning process is pretty much automatic at a press of the button. It's the typical 'great hardware' - 'mediocre software' phenomenon. Having nicely designed software would make this an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: br0ca

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delighted with this scanner
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this scanner. After years of battling with various scanners, this one is a breeze to use. Doesn't take up much room and if I want to scan something I just open it up, put the document in, press the button and off it goes. The interface on the PC is easy to understand and use. I can scan from my phone although I don't tend to do that much. The only little niggle was after the upgrade to windows 10 the scanner interface doesn't always load when you open up the scanner but in seconds I can start it manually anyway so its really not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dairymaid

customer_reviews.title: As good as it says
customer_reviews.text: brilliant - practical and although I am not paper free (yet) the amount of stuff on my desk is diminishing. As a person who uses multi mobile devices its is brill for attaching stuff to calendars and notes - I use a Mac and it works just fine with it. double sided copying - excellent. Took me some time to decide about getting this sort of scanner but I am very pleased that I did load it up press the button and off it goes! Read the other reviews for techi stuff it was worth spending the time before deciding which to go for - but this one certainly works for me
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Rowberry

customer_reviews.title: Life changing?
customer_reviews.text: I have a multifunction printer with a auto-document feeder scanner. This is something else entirely. Perhaps the Rolls Royce of scanners, it's wireless - throw in a stack of differently sized documents, it scans double sided, rocketing them through at a lightening pace, converting everything to OCR/searchable PDF and storing it all directly to the cloud. It's given me back hours a week. It's never gone wrong once but if it broke tomorrow I'd buy it again instantly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: a very nice piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply this is an amazing little scanner. it is compact and the sheet feeder and paper holder fold away very neatly. Set up is very simple and instructions quite clear , I have mine wired using USB but there is also a wireless option which i have not used. The great thing about it is how quickly it scans double sided docents in a single pass, even multiple pages, no problem at all. i have only scanned A4 and US letter sized documents so far so cannot comment on its ability to handle other paper sizes or types. Files full of old bank statements and other clutter will soon be a thing of the past as
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Pair it with a good shredder and some cloud account like Dropbox and you ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about going paperless - THEN TAKE THE PLUNGE!!! This machine really is very fast and capable. Pair it with a good shredder and some cloud account like Dropbox and you can securely file everything away with zero clutter. When I had completed the transition for my wife's business I must have shredded paperwork about 3ft high. The quality of the scans is excellent. I have not used the extra software much (but it does come in Mac versions). Wireless set up is reasonably painless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best productivity product ever
customer_reviews.text: It is now 2 years since I bought this Fujitsu Scan Snap iX500. It continues to work beautifully and has transformed my productivity. Just scan everything into searchable PDF format and then shred the original doc if hard copy is not required. It is fast, convenient and easy to use. A magnificent piece of kit for anyone with a home office.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to use and good for variety and volume of scans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use at work and we now have 4. Good quality and easy to set up and use. Folded up it is really compact so is easy to sit on the desk all day and just open up when required. We selected this one because of the hopper allowing you to scan multiple sheets to one document. It also claims to be up to A3 which we haven't yet tried. However, it is easily coping with the variety of document sizes experienced in a purchase ledger department.
customer_reviews.author: Flixton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner. It was very easy to install using the disc. Very easy to use and so fast at scanning a multi sheet double sided document, I couldn't believe it. Until now I've been using a printer, which was slow and inconvenient. Documents that would have taken over an hour were done in less than 15 minutes. Very easy to select where you want the files saved to.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne B

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard for Sheet fed document scanners.
customer_reviews.text: Since buying this I've set up dedicated 15gb Google Drive account and have taken my home office paperless. It's also been very useful for my bookkeeping business. Should you spend the extra to get this model rather than the cheaper S models? I suspect that if your usage is purely home office the answer is probably not, but it's a very good piece of kit and if you can afford to spend more, this is the gold standard.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Slater

customer_reviews.title: I must say this is a fantastic piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this off the back of a ten minute conversation with a work colleague who has gone paperless. I must say this is a fantastic piece of technology, it has transformed the way in which I manage and store documentation. The device itself is incredibly well made and smaller in real life than I had expected. I use an iMac and the software is incredibly stable. If you wish to tag documentation and provide a structure you either create a directory structure or purchase additional software e.g. DEVON Think Pro. In terms of performance (throughput) the scanner is very fast, I managed to scan 6x very full Lever arch files in one evening. Not a purchase to regret.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Whymark

customer_reviews.title: Ace scanner semi portable
customer_reviews.text: great size and speed. All accurate. Would have liked to adjust the dpi on the scanner but it looks like it is fixed. weighted up over the epson or canon equivalents I think I made the right choice, especially with the price. Great service from Ryman, ahead of schedule....
customer_reviews.author: K. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Just a brilliant Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Having used a previous model of a Fujitsu S510 ScanSnap Scanner and then replacing it with a far inferior Kodak i1120 Scanner which caused me no end of frustration I've now made the decision to replace this with a ScanSnap iX500 and on my early use experience is light years better than the two scanners that went before. Scans are quick, and the USB3 communication means this is about as good as it gets at this price point. The ScanSnap Organiser software is exceptional and getting a full version of Adobe Acrobat X1 is just the icing on the cake. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watkin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scanner, well-worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to scan documents, a task it excels at. The auto-document-feed is brilliant and reduces time spent scanning by a considerable amount. I have also used it to scan photos and cards and again, performance is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for getting rid of the paper in your life
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. I am a previous satisfied owner of the Scansnap 1300s and took advantage of the recent promotional price to upgrade to this model. The difference in speed and sorting ability is incredible I scan all documents I receive, that then go into the shredder. It really is a great way of getting rid of paper clutter. I use this on a Mac coupled with Devonthink Pro Office which is a great combination if you are looking to step up from the provided applications
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great high speed scanner
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is fantastic. It scans at high speed, scanning both sides of the paper simultaneously. It comes with a good set of software, including Abby fine reader and nuance PDF software which can be used for editing PDFs. It handles long sheets and also letter size paper, which is slightly wider than A4. The scanner is compact so easily fits on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended scanner
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant scanner, very VERY quick and very accurate. Have had occasional paper jams where I've forgotten a couple of sheets were stapled together, but the scanner deals with very well, stops, and allows you to deal with the jam before continuing the scan. If you're looking for a fast, accurate scanner for regular use, this is the one to get!!
customer_reviews.author: mclaren88

customer_reviews.title: Ideal document scanner
customer_reviews.text: I have had this scanner for over 2 years. I have scanned over a thousand items and can't fault it. It has only jammed when I have abused it and even then it was really easy to open up to clear the blockage. Ultra rapid. Works smoothly in wireless mode. Folds away to a very compact unit when not in use. I have cleared bookshelves of documents in ring back folders to my Nexus tablet, so the previous contents of the bookshelves can always be at hand's length. I use the excellent SynchMe app to synchronise the Nexus with a network hard drive but there are plenty of options to keep a copy of your data in a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A great document scanner.
customer_reviews.text: The software takes a while to install, but after that, every time you open the scanner top, it is ready to go. Very quick - about 25 sheets a minute, with double sided copying. This is a joy to use! Scans all sizes of paper (up to A4), without problems. The document feeder handles about 25 sheets and works well.
customer_reviews.author: David Hall

customer_reviews.title: One of THE best bits of office kit you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutley bloody marvellous! Makes scanning almost a joy. It's so easy to use, ridiculously quick and accurate and the software works really well. Only neg is that I wish you could tell it to save scans to files no bigger than x meg: we constantly have to send large files to suppliers, and some of them cannot take more than 5mb at a time. But if that's the only niggle it means scansnap is pretty darned perfect!
customer_reviews.author: HappySmile

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: If it is possible to have inappropriate feelings towards a scanner then I have them - this thing is so fast and smooth and easy to use. Made going paper-free in my office a doddle and churns through big piles of paper without missing a beat. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one ages ago!
customer_reviews.text: My New Year's resolution was to de-clutter, so bought myself one of these after reading the good reviews. Was not disappointed, super fast, easy and to set up. Really neat and small, fits on my little desk next to my iMac. Apart from a minor message about a port being busy occasionally, it runs like a dream. I plan to be clear of all but 1 month old papers by next week!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaLee

customer_reviews.title: Fujitsu auto feed scanner
customer_reviews.text: My word, this is good! Small, but very solid and well made. Paper handling is extremely fast and impressive. I have been scanning a lot of old magazines (guillotined down the centre) that have thicker cover pages than the inside pages - which occasionally stick (due to damp storage) and double feed. The scanner somehow ignores the thick cover pages but picks up on double-fed thin pages. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A

customer_reviews.title: Speeds when connected by cable are very fast and the WiFi speeds are good. Not disappointed with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fujitsu Scansnap ix500 . We have spent a day setting up and using it and we are impressed by the speed of the scanning, the functionality of the scanner and the process whereby one changes the recipient PC of the WiFi transmitted files. Speeds when connected by cable are very fast and the WiFi speeds are good. Not disappointed with purchase. It does duplex scanning very well and multipaged documents easily.We are not yet sure about high resolution photographs and scan results but it scans photos easily to jpeg and it can convert them to pdf. Despite this point, we are well pleased with the purchase.Neat and good design
customer_reviews.author: Dr Michael Plumley

customer_reviews.title: Sold as new when it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: Sold as new when it was re-conditions - We have had the scanner since 2016 and we have always had issues with connectivity, nothing too much otherwise we would have returned the item. It now has no connectivity and upon investigation out IT have found that it was re-soldered and the connection port put in incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Liz T

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this scanner, I bought 2.
customer_reviews.text: I first got one of these scanners for my office, lots of documents and receipts to scan. I was so happy with it I've got a second one to use in my home office to try and make more workspace more paperless. Fast scanner, easy to use with good quality PDFs made.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Badger

customer_reviews.title: A really good scanner but two years in I can't get straight ...
customer_reviews.text: A really good scanner but two years in I can't get straight scans out of it anymore. We used it regularly but not like crazy. Every scan is tilted a couple of degrees which makes them look really cheap. Considering how much I paid for this thing ... not good enough. I cleaned everything I can think of and none of the rolls show any wear, but still ... everything is on the wonk.
customer_reviews.author: GuidoLondon

customer_reviews.title: Best business scanner ever.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this scanner. One of the best business investments I have ever made. Small, stylish, lightweight. It is quiet and quick - scanning double sided documents in seconds. I like the wide range of applications particularly scan to OCR and scan to email, mobile, file etc. can't think of any business operation I would need it to do that it doesn't already include. The only thing I haven't used it for is scanning photos so can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: But it's a great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other reviewers, I have had no problem with the WiFi. Counter intuitively, it's the USB connection that sometimes fails. But it's a great piece of kit, compact, fast and efficient, and duplexes effortlessly. No.2 son commented that it looks like something Batman might have, so it's henceforth known as the Batscanner. Highly recommended, minus one star because of the USB thing, works fine with Windows 10 (the issue with my previous scanner. I use it most days and it can cope with e.g. 60 pages of bank statements no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Coxy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely. Freaking. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, very reliable. Easy setup. Document feeder is very reliable, and when it does misfeed, notices immediately. Quality is perfectly good; was never going to beat my Epson V700, but that's not what the ScanSnap is for. This thing eats through piles of paperwork in no time. Software is good.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Great size and very easy to use.  Perfect for personal and business users.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is a great little product which sits nicely on the desk and doesn't take up too much space. It is very easy to use and very reliable. It was easy and straight forward to set up initially and it has worked efficiently ever since. We use this for both personal and business use and we've not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DaintyDi20

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Fast Duplex Scanning
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to set up as either a wired or wireless device and pairing it with a mobile device like a tablet or mobile is really simple. Once the setup is complete the scanner is simple to use and documents are scanned extremely swiftly. What's most useful is the option to scan both sides of your documents at once. Documents are converted quickly to PDF formats. Excellent device.
customer_reviews.author: M/R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and smart scanner. A number of improvements since my Fujitsu from about 5 years ago, e.g., ability to scan stiff cards. Wifi connection is of questionable utility but does work to scan things to my smartphone. A real workhorse for converting a large amount of paper to digital for the paperless office. Nice bundle with Adobe Acrobat, and pretty fast OCR so I just leave that turned on to allow searching in all my PDFs. Works well on a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M. Potter

customer_reviews.title: The best scanner I've used.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic, really quick, easy to use, don't know why we struggled on with our previous scanner for so long. Used in a small office to make us as paperless as possible and is a great piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: IC1729

customer_reviews.title: Quick and effective but requires a PC to work
customer_reviews.text: The device is effective, rapid, accurate and works very well. I was however hoping that it was a little more autonomous - in that I could simply scan documents independently and have these saved to a network drive where I could intercept them as part of a workflow. So in conclusion it does not quite as expected - my fault. But what it does do it does effectively, quickly with very little fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for office document storage and filing.
customer_reviews.text: Best document scanner for multiple sheets that I’ve used. Quick reliable and simple to save into computer files or email on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like the Epson V series or Canon Lide were not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of photo prints that I wanted to scan and hold digitally. I wanted an automatic document feeder, so a flat bed scanner, like the Epson V series or Canon Lide were not an option, so took a punt on this scanner. The scanner is brilliant, very fast and scans the photos really well. Very pleased and would highly recommend. --- Have had the scanner for last ten months and still love it; incredibly fast and accurate. I had formerly rated as five stars, but have down rated as the wifi isn't effective. Having said this, I would definitely this scanner again, in the event that I lost the current one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant first step towards paperless office
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product. I was worried how it would link up to my Mac, but it is seamless and very very easy and quick. It worked very simply via wifi to mobile devices, but I use it wired to Mac and name and collate each document straight onto there. There are many options such as PDF to Word, even though the bundled Adobe package is not suited to Mac, and couldn't be used. I'm not sure about the auto rotate option as some pages end up upside down when that is in use. Best to check the originals first and not use that option.
customer_reviews.author: Zrinkand

customer_reviews.title: Wowscan
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fast. Great build and picture quality. iPad compatible. Takes the pain out of scanning. The apps could be a little more polished, but are perfectly functional. Would be nice to connect more than one computer wirelessly, and ideally to just press the button and have it upload the scan to Dropbox without using a computer at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic high speed scanner for documents.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic scanner, very fast and accurate scanning. Perfect if you have a large stack of documents to archive. Photo quality isn't up to a flatbed, but that's not the primary purpose of this type of scanner. I bought mine to archive a load of old paperwork in my goal to go paperless at home. As a general purpose document scanner you'll have to try hard to beat it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Olpin

customer_reviews.title: save your scanned document as soon as scanned in
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speed and ease of use. However I was let down by not being able to save scanned documents in the temporary folder. I did not file them prior to leaving for a 7-day break and on my return they were no longer in my computer's memory. This I could do with my old, very slow scanner, which I upgraded to this model for the speed and the double side scanning features. Otherwise I am very happy about the scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Giulia Vera Quintarelli

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. The apps are good for setup but they could probably do with a little update. However all’s good so far
customer_reviews.author: vpo22

customer_reviews.title: Scansnap - Cloud & Local
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bit of kit. When the pc is running, scansnap connects via WiFi to the pc and the installed scan software can be used. If the pc is off line, scansnap will scan to a cloud folder (Dropbox). The file can then be renamed and moved to pc location as required. It only takes 10secs to scan 10 sheets (duplex) to the cloud.
customer_reviews.author: BobF

customer_reviews.title: Can’t handle very thin paper.
customer_reviews.text: Careful with very thin pages - otherwise okay - document feeder seems to not be able to separate them effectively. It comes with a document holder - not sure what that is for. Seems okay for thicker pages. May have to return - but nice and compact.
customer_reviews.author: EmmeF

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product, scanned eight years worth of documents within few hours. Everything is perfect : workflow, overlap detection, ocr generating searchable pdf... highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: fredfr

customer_reviews.title: just works beautifully. no regret at all paying for it
customer_reviews.text: used it loads. just works beautifully. no regret at all paying for it.
customer_reviews.author: Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Previously had the 1300i and wasn't sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it.Previously had the 1300i and wasn't sure it was worth upgrading. Saw it in the Bolack Friday deals and decided to try it, don't regret it at all. It's a little bigger than the 1300i, but it's worth it - scanning is faster, bigger capacity, even better feed chute. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Very good documents scanner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this scanner since January 2015 connected wirelessly through my iMac. It is the best document scanner and in my opinion a must for home office or if you want to go paperless. It is not suitable for scanning high quality photos but it is the fastest and a brilliant documents scanner. I wish it came in white to blend in with my iMac :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kuldeep Mann

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but a quality fast bulk scanner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to double side scan 100 pages which needed to be accurate with no misalignment or page skips for a court case. My local copy shop had previously made a mess of it, took hours, and had to do it again on their expensive big photocopiers. In contrast this little gem took minutes. I was even able to get 70 pages done in one pass. Now scanning loads of old stuff to go paperless.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rhydding

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scanner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic scanner. I've used a few before. This is by far the quickest and the software is great. It also comes with a full version of Adobe to edit pdf documents once they've been scanned. That itself is worth £200. I'd recommend this for anyone with a small business that needs to get a lot of scanning done on a daily basis. It even auto aligns/rotates documents scanned so it comes out correctly in final document. It scams double sided and if one side doesn't need to be scanned and is blanked it won't include that. You can even scan direct to a cloud storage space as well as desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Deeban

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy to use. Lots of scanning options. High quality scans. Multiple, and I mean lots and lots of sheet feed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AED

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Easy to use and very quick. Should have bought one of these years ago. Much better than the mfp scanners I have had before and duplex scanning is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: LiterAl

customer_reviews.title: Scansnap ix500
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Scansnaps for nearly 10 years now and have been responsible for the purchase of over 50 of them for clients, colleagues and friends. My old one has only just given up! This new replacement is just as fantastic as the original, but with extra features such as scan to wifi etc. Highly recommend this to anyone who needs to scan stuff into their systems in an efficient and hassle-free way.
customer_reviews.author: Guzzzlinggilbert

customer_reviews.title: Never loved a scanner sooooo much
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this scanner, easy set up, easy to use, single and double sided, saves to folder, email, PDF, print. Wireless easy to set up - not so easy to change computers but that's probably I've tried other scanners and always come back to this make - excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Wade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but seeminly no wireless for laptops.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great scanner. Super fast and accurate. It is just amazingly quick. The only issue is that it doesn't seem to have wireless access; it has wireless access from a mobile device only. Therefore, I am unable to wirelessly print from laptop. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: PoundIt

customer_reviews.title: I love this scanner
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about spending so much on a scanner but this was worth every penny. It's easy to use, quick and has removed so much paper from my life. It's brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: SGIll

customer_reviews.title: ... need documents doing quickly both sides I could not recommend a better solution Great scanner quiet and fast
customer_reviews.text: Until I purchased this unit I never realized how backward a flatbed scanner was ok for the odd picture but if you need documents doing quickly both sides I could not recommend a better solution Great scanner quiet and fast.
customer_reviews.author: g e garnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and compact
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for a one-person business. Fast accurate scanning of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Backler

customer_reviews.title: really great scaner
customer_reviews.text: fast and great quality. Easy to set up and works very well wifi, no problems with connecting to the computer. Actually if only you open the cover of the scanner it's automatically connecting to my laptop. Also the business card reader is absolutely great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: It just worked. No hassle. No problems yet (on Mac)
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scanner about 6 months, and used it quite a bit. It hasn't let me down. Fast, flexible, and can be made to fit my workflow easily. Tech support was good when I had a question about how to achieve something. Can embed the text of the document into a PDF, making the PDF searchable in the Mac Finder (or Windows Explorer). Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine - cannot believe how quick it copies and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine - cannot believe how quick it copies and it's so so easy to do so. Set up is no hassle at all . The supporting software is clear and works perfect . its a little more expensive than other similar machines but having tried others it's worth every penny. Don't hesitate just buy it ! You won't send it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Tozer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be without this fast scanner. So quick and was to use-don’t have to tell it, it just senses if single or double sided paper, it’s a delight.
customer_reviews.author: L A Mullen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEMs very good quaility
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SAVES ME LOADS OF TIME EASY USE AND SET UP
customer_reviews.author: hayley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, super fast and very intelligent, scanned 1500 fine drawings in a few hours at 600 dpi. Very good, not mistakes, didn't jam.
customer_reviews.author: hardworking guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant scanner. It came with lots of extra software for intelligent scanning of receipts, business cards etc. It's really easy to set up and user friendly. It even senses if there's an overlapping page.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: The speed and quality of the scans are amazing. I use it with OSX and had no ...
customer_reviews.text: The speed and quality of the scans are amazing. I use it with OSX and had no problems with set-up or operation. The ability to make multiple "profiles" and access them easily straight from the Scansnap icon in the Dock makes for a very streamlined workflow. I had thought it would be good, but it has exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: KindleLover

customer_reviews.title: Very good for Paperless Office and Integrations with Receipt/Entryless/Xero
customer_reviews.text: Very good, the must have for bookkeepers and Accountants and admins in medium to big sized companies We use these machines to implement to clients for "paperless office" and Integration with Entryless/Receipt bank/Xero Need to be careful as sometimes it jam paper But the design and quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sizov

customer_reviews.title: The best for going paperless...
customer_reviews.text: This product for home/little business use is great. I used it (to be precise the previous model, not wifi enabled) for 2 years at my previous job... when I left I knew I had to buy it. It's simply the best scanner around for handling a paperless workflow... fast, very efficient, brilliant software and super reliable! If in doubt... trust me really a safe buy!
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio G.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Canon DR 2580C which I have used for years, and which was starting to show its age with increased mis-feeding etc. The ScanSnap shows how far personal scanners have progressed. The sheet feeding is quick and efficient (I don't get as many pages in the feed tray that they suggest - maybe due to paper thickness?), and the scanning quality is much superior. I used to have to manually set black & white / greyscale / colour / duplex - this does it all automatically, and better. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am moving to store documents on modern separate disc drives and PDF is the best format. This device was so simple to install and worked instantly. It really shoots through the documents with amazing accuracy. Believe every good thing you read about it.
customer_reviews.author: GrumpyGrizzly

customer_reviews.title: Fast scanner saves lots of time
customer_reviews.text: Fastest desktop scanner I have come across that is not for specific office environments. Very clear capture of documents and the bundled software is pretty accurate on the character recognition side. Scanning is actually faster than the subsequent OCR processing. Only downside is the wifi if you use that it that it can only be configured to send to one computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, fast, intelligent scanner. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant scanner. Scans both sides of a document at the same time. Auto-detects blank pages and colour pages. Excellent quality scans and very fast. I am very impressed with this scanner and would highly recommend it to anyone who needs to do a lot of scanning. Only scans from auto-feeder which is it's only tiny flaw but I get around that by copying anything that cannot be auto-fed first and then scan the copy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fast
customer_reviews.text: Scans both sides in a couple of seconds - brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Scans quickly and with good results although does have a slight tendency to jam ...
customer_reviews.text: Scans quickly and with good results although does have a slight tendency to jam if you put a large document in because the scanned sheets stack up on the exit tray/shelf. However because it scans so quickly you can just stand there and take them off every few sheets as it scans to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: DWB

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought it a long time ago, makes life easier, as I have loads of documents to scan
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Simple once set up
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit of a task to set it up but once that's done it just works - love the fact it can scan straight to the iPhone and then into Evernote. Would be great if it could go straight to Evernote or email without the step in the middle - must only be a bit of software away as the device is on wifi already.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Coates

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tool for a paperless office!
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey, don't get me wrong but is an absolutely brilliant scanner. I bought the Scansnap ix500 to help fulfil my new years resolution of having a completely paperless office (as far as possible) by the end of the year. With the help of the scanner, Evernote and a bit of dedication my goal has almost been achieved. Scans both sides of an A4 piece of paper within two seconds. It doesn't matter which way up you put the paper because the software will automatically rotate so that the text is the correct orientation. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Fast, efficient, effective. Get over the price, and treat yourself.
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely brilliant machine.... rather expensive, but if you want speed and efficiency, and are fed up with slow, clumsy scanning on a typical "all-in-one"-type device, this absolutely and totally whops any such scanner, completely hands down, for performance.
customer_reviews.author: PatrickOfLondon

customer_reviews.title: ... scanners over the last 7 years and they are brilliant. The reason for the purchase is due to ...
customer_reviews.text: We have bought several of these scanners over the last 7 years and they are brilliant. The reason for the purchase is due to Office expansion. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lizalouise

customer_reviews.title: Superb speed, quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: Speed & quality are excellent. You do have to quite regularly clean the inside scan heads as if, like myself you are scanning old photos, the scan heads tend to get a little grubby.
customer_reviews.author: gingernob

customer_reviews.title: FUJITSU ScanSnap iX500 Document Scanner ... Brilliant Product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Easy to install. Easy to use. Quiet, reliable. 25 ppm is under estimating. I'm getting nearer 28ppm (56 ppm if double sided scan) to create searchable PDF's. OCR is pretty good too. Only slight negative is converting to word, tables don't convert easily. Other than that its brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: NWC

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This has transformed my office file keeping. It's saved me over £350 a year in professional shredding services. It's super quick and easy to use straight from the box.
customer_reviews.author: Martin P Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is but a great product nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for what it is but a great product nonetheless. Couldn't see me justifying the cost for home/personal use but for a business it is very effective. Small footprint and fast, flexible scanning with the option to export to Word and Excel.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Syncs really well with Evernote and you can scan receipts, docs, business cards etc. But fiddly at times during setup but got there in the end. Delivered on time and in good shape, although the packaging was a bit shabby.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Brillant scanner for paperless office
customer_reviews.text: Brillant scanner that is able to handle many different sizes of paper. It is a very quick scanner with a good set of software. Mine is connect to MacBook and works very well with the my software. Once you get this no other scanner comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant bit of kit which saves me so much time in the office
customer_reviews.author: Scooby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic document scanner
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic document scanner, if you scan anything other than photographs etc, forget the flatbed scanner and get something like this. I haven't tried all the alternatives, but I have a hard time believing they can be better and easier to use than this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesper

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner, but sometimes fails to link to computer.
customer_reviews.text: Should really have 5 stars, but there are some days when it just won't link to my router. The scanner is just over 2ft from the computer, & 4ft from the router. I've gained a lot of space already in my filing system, scanning and scrapping piles of old bills.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT have TWAIN, ISIS or WIA drivers, making this very inconvenient if you have to use some other app. Otherwise, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Nimish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of kit. Easy to set up and scans are fast and reliable. Duplex mode very impressive. Footprint smaller than expected so fits easily on desk.
customer_reviews.author: aj smith

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but we'll worth it. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little scanner, expensive but worth every penny. Has made my scanning life a whole lot easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good speed and quality
customer_reviews.text: It has made scanning and organising large quantities of documents so easy. The enclosed software is terrific for editing inserting and extracting of pages.
customer_reviews.author: A_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hardware, poor Mac software
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine, but Mac software could be better: Windows users get Adobe software, we get a suite of programs that do not install in the usual way that Mac apps do, and constantly demand large updates which then freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sofar so good. Does exacttly what it zays and its very ...
customer_reviews.text: Sofar so good. Does exacttly what it zays and its very quick. So far its the best scanner I have ever bought for my business.
customer_reviews.author: G. Moulton

customer_reviews.title: This scanner is great and I use it with the wifi
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is great and I use it with the wifi. However the usb port that links it directly to the computer is broken and if I have wifi problems, I can't use this port. Can the usb port be fixed easily?
customer_reviews.author: Bursar, S.

product_meta.title: Fujitsu PA03656-B301 Scan Snap iX500 Document Scanner
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Document ScannerFujitsu Scan Snap iX500 Document scanner Duplex 216 x 863 mm 600 dpi x 600 dpi up to 25 ppm mono up to 25 ppm color ADF 50 sheets USB 30 Wi-Fi PA03656B301 Scanners Scanners.

BOX CONTAINS
Fujitsu ScanSnap iX500
feature_bullets: One button searchable PDF creation, scan batches of mixed sized pages in one go!
Scan everyday documents from business cards to A4 and even A3 with the included carrier sheet
Double sided scanner means both sides are scanned in one pass. Advanced paper feeding system
Effortless "one touch" scanning with no complicated settings, Instantly convert paper documents into useful applications to manage your paper documents, business cards or receipts
Nuance software can be downloaded with the code from the manufacturer's website.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars912 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
